entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cape George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
